articles.author: Edward Szekeres
articles.title: Western allies rally around Zelensky after Trump spat deepens rift with Europe - CNN
articles.description: Western leaders scrambled to back Ukraine after Friday’s acrimonious meeting between Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelensky deepened the already yawning fault lines between Washington and many of its key allies.
articles.content: Western leaders scrambled to back Ukraine after Fridays acrimonious meeting between Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelensky deepened the already yawning fault lines between Washington and many of its key… [+5524 chars]
